    • canBeBought

      public boolean canBeBought(float amount)
      This function try to buy given amount of each share that is contained in that asset. However in any time some different guy may buy all available share that we did not check. So if this operation fails we unfreeze all Shares that we tried to buy
      Overrides:
      canBeBought in class Asset
      Parameters:
